rows.label: qev030502_MSG0001
rows.name: Hello. It is Hala.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030502_MSG0002
rows.name:
...Then you have Quegga's body? Good.
Take it. Feed it to beast.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030502_MSG0003
rows.name:
But first you must search body. Look for keepsake or
other personal effects.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030502_MSG0004
rows.name: Thea will want something to keep close.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030502_JNK0010
rows.name: Examine the Body

rows.label: qev030502_SEL0011
rows.name: Search Quegga's body for a memento.

rows.label: qev030502_JNK0020
rows.name: Examine the Area

rows.label: qev030502_SEL0021
rows.name: Look around for something of Quegga's.

rows.label: qev030502_MSG0005
rows.name: ...You found strange note? What does it say?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030502_MSG0006
rows.name:
"I hid...for Thea in...Scabland Fortress cave.
Please...to Thea?"[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030502_MSG0007
rows.name: I see. He made her gift. But what?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030502_MSG0008
rows.name:
Hmm. Curious. Can you go look for gift?
I know I am increasing work, but it is important.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030502_MSG0009
rows.name: Gift may be perfect thing to cheer Thea up.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030502_JNK0030
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qev030502_SEL0031
rows.name: Accept Hala's request.

rows.label: qev030502_JNK0040
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: qev030502_SEL0041
rows.name: Turn Hala down.

rows.label: qev030502_MSG0010
rows.name: You BLADEs are noble. I leave it to you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030502_MSG0011
rows.name:
I am sorry. I did not hear you.
Connection is poor.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030502_MSG0012
rows.name:
Please do this. I love Thea's dance.
It made her happy. I want to see it again.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030502_MSG0013
rows.name: I know you will help. Best of luck.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030502_MSG0014
rows.name:
But there is still Quegga. You must find bait to attract
beast worthy of eating him.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030502_MSG0015
rows.name:
Beasts of that area favor bone-in thigh meat.
Find some. Lay it next to him.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030502_MSG0016
rows.name:
I ask much. But I know you will succeed.
I leave it to you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030502_MSG0017
rows.name: Hello? It is Hala. Have you found bone-in thigh meat?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030502_MSG0018
rows.name:
Yes. That will do. Now lay it by his side.
It will draw beast close.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030502_MSG0019
rows.name:
Good. Now you must wait. Find place to hide.
Bear witness to end of his flesh.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030502_MSG0020
rows.name: It is me again. I forgot something.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030502_MSG0021
rows.name: All beasts in that area have keen hearing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030502_MSG0022
rows.name:
If you make noise, they will attack.
Be silent if one draws close.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030502_MSG0023
rows.name:
...Hmm? You are in middle of something?
Sorry to disturb.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030502_MSG0024
rows.name: Do your best. I will think of you.[ST:wait ]
